description:
Job description

Production Manager for Skincare


Production Team Leadership

  • Oversee daily production activities, including communicating daily with the Contract Manufacturer and 3PL to resolve their needs.
  • Lead and manage the workflow between the CM and the 3PL.
  • Be prepared to travel between the CM in Chatsworth and the 3PL in Fontana.
  • Receive incoming shipments and verify packing slips.
  • Identify opportunities to improve production efficiency and reduce waste.
  • Meet PO timelines and trouble shoot with the CM and 3PL to prevent any delays.
  • Forecast primary and secondary packaging needs. 
  • Work from home to handle all administrative tasks and meet virtually with the rest of the team


Quality Control

  • Implement and maintain quality control processes to ensure componentry and finished goods meet quality standards and BOMs.
  • Quality control incoming goods and report damages.
  • Establish and maintain an organized work schedule.


Oversee Fulfillment

  • Be the direct line of communication with the 3PL to make sure all orders are fulfilled and immediately resolve Shopify issues.
  • Assist in customer exchanges or returns.
  • Replenish packing materials as needed.


Inventory Management

  • Manage all raw materials and components.
  • Ensure all inventories are reconciled at the EOM.
  • Track and maintain a lot coding system.


Schedule:

  • 6-8 hour shift


Experience:

  • Manufacturing management: 2 years (Preferred)
  • Shopify: 2 years (Preferred)


Ability to Commute:

  • Chatsworth, CA (Required)


Willingness to travel:

  • 50% (Required)


Work Location: In person and remote.


Job Type: Contract
